courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: Explore the fundamental concepts of computer science, including problem-solving techniques, basic programming concepts, and an overview of computer systems. Perfect starting point for beginners in tech.

courses.title: Computational Thinking
courses.description: Develop essential problem-solving skills through computational thinking. Learn decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, and algorithm design principles.

courses.title: Intro Digital Logic and Computer Architecture
courses.description: Understand how computers work at the hardware level. Study digital logic gates, binary systems, processor architecture, and basic computer organization principles.

courses.title: Programming Fundamentals
courses.description: Master core programming concepts including variables, data types, control structures, functions, and basic problem-solving techniques. Build a strong foundation for your programming journey.

courses.title: Object-Oriented Programming
courses.description: Learn essential OOP concepts including classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. Practice designing and implementing object-oriented solutions to real-world problems.

courses.title: Intro to Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Study fundamental data structures (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs) and algorithms (sorting, searching, traversal). Learn algorithm analysis and optimization techniques.

courses.title: Software Design and Architecture
courses.description: Explore software design patterns, architectural principles, and best practices for building scalable applications. Learn system design, modularity, and code organization.

courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn essential web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build responsive websites and understand modern web development principles and practices.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Master mobile app development fundamentals, including UI design, app architecture, and platform-specific features. Build real-world mobile applications for iOS and Android.

courses.title: Discrete Mathematics
courses.description: Study fundamental mathematical structures for computer science, including logic, set theory, relations, functions, combinatorics, and graph theory. Essential for algorithm analysis and programming.

courses.title: Linear Algebra for CS
courses.description: Master essential linear algebra concepts for computer science, including vectors, matrices, linear transformations, and eigenvalues. Applications in computer graphics, machine learning, and optimization.

courses.title: Probability and Statistics
courses.description: Learn probability theory, statistical inference, and data analysis techniques crucial for computer science. Topics include random variables, distributions, hypothesis testing, and statistical modeling.

courses.title: Calculus for Computer Science
courses.description: Study differential and integral calculus with computer science applications. Focus on optimization, numerical methods, and mathematical modeling for algorithms and machine learning.

courses.title: Operating Systems Principles
courses.description: Explore core operating system concepts including process management, memory management, file systems, and scheduling algorithms. Learn about synchronization, deadlocks, and system security fundamentals.

courses.title: Computer Networks
courses.description: Study computer networking fundamentals, protocols, and architectures. Cover TCS/IP, routing, network security, and socket programming. Hands-on experience with network tools and protocol implementation.

courses.title: Database Systems
courses.description: Master database design principles, SQL, normalization, and transaction management. Learn about query optimization, concurrency control, and modern NoSQL systems. Build robust data-driven applications.

courses.title: Cloud Computing and Distributed Systems
courses.description: Explore distributed system architectures, cloud services, and scalability principles. Learn about containerization, microservices, fault tolerance, and distributed data processing frameworks.

courses.title: Theory of Computation
courses.description: Study fundamental theoretical concepts including automata theory, formal languages, Turing machines, computability, and complexity theory. Explore the limits of what computers can and cannot compute.

courses.title: Advanced Algorithms
courses.description: Deep dive into advanced algorithm design and analysis, including approximation algorithms, randomized algorithms, network flows, and NP-completeness. Study optimization techniques and complexity analysis.

courses.title: Cryptography and Information Security
courses.description: Master modern cryptographic algorithms, protocols, and security principles. Study public-key cryptography, digital signatures, secure communications, and blockchain fundamentals. Includes hands-on security implementations.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
courses.description: Comprehensive study of AI/ML fundamentals including supervised/unsupervised learning, neural networks, deep learning, and natural language processing. Implement and train models using modern frameworks.

courses.title: Data Science and Analytics
courses.description: Master data analysis techniques, statistical methods, data visualization, and predictive modeling. Learn big data processing, data mining, and practical applications using real-world datasets.

courses.title: Computer Graphics and Visualization
courses.description: Study 2D/3D graphics programming, rendering algorithms, geometric modeling, and visualization techniques. Implement graphics pipelines and interactive visualization systems using modern APIs.

courses.title: Software Engineering Practices
courses.description: Advanced software development methodologies, project management, testing strategies, and DevOps practices. Focus on large-scale system design, agile methods, and continuous integration/deployment.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Cybersecurity
courses.description: Comprehensive coverage of cybersecurity principles, threat analysis, secure system design, and ethical hacking. Study network security, malware analysis, and incident response techniques.

courses.title: Parallel, Concurrent, and Distributed Programming
courses.description: Advanced study of parallel programming paradigms, concurrent algorithm design, and distributed systems implementation. Cover multi-threading, synchronization, distributed algorithms, and parallel performance optimization.

courses.title: Compilers
courses.description: In-depth study of compiler design and implementation. Topics include lexical analysis, parsing, semantic analysis, intermediate code generation, optimization techniques, and target code generation.

courses.title: Introduction to Formal Verification
courses.description: Study of mathematical techniques for verifying correctness of hardware/software systems. Topics include model checking, theorem proving, static analysis, and formal specification languages.

courses.title: Quantum Computing
courses.description: Introduction to quantum computing principles, quantum algorithms, and quantum information theory. Study quantum gates, circuits, error correction, and practical applications in cryptography and optimization.

courses.title: Robotics
courses.description: Comprehensive study of robotics including kinematics, dynamics, control theory, sensor integration, and AI applications. Hands-on experience with robot programming and system design.
